topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e8f92363687208c6e21a00#post_54e8f92363687208c6e21a00
If it is, i have no idea how to interpret these dreams.

The first dream started out as a nightmare where [spoiler]i was abducted by an underground sex slavery ring[/spoiler]

Then i escaped and [spoiler]stormed the slavers' headquarters with a bunch of ISIS fighters and we beheaded them all[/spoiler]

The second dream had me and a few of my friends travel back in time to watch the 9/11 attacks live
We somehow caused a nuclear war and were turned into fallout ghouls doomed to wander the post-apocalyptic wasteland forever.

I think the weirdest and quite possibly the funniest dream i've ever had was one that involved me going on a bit of an adventure with this guy:
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/09/Marko_Forss.jpg/220px-Marko_Forss.jpg!

He's Marko Forss, aka 'Fobba', a finnish internet cop who's pretty famous in the finnish-speaking parts of the internet.

t'was a long and strange dream.
